metadata.title: CVE-2018-19360 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: FasterXML jackson-databind 2.x before 2.9.8 might allow attackers to have unspecified impact by leveraging failure to block the axis2-transport-jms class from polymorphic deserialization. It was discovered that Jackson Databind incorrectly handled deserialization. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code or other unspecified impact.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.9.8-1').
